thread.title: BRIEF-China Lodging Group Ltd - Preliminary RevPAR For Leased And Owned Hotels For Q1 2018 RMB 208 Versus RMB 174

title: BRIEF-China Lodging Group Ltd - Preliminary RevPAR For Leased And Owned Hotels For Q1 2018 RMB 208 Versus RMB 174
text:
Market News April 16, 2018 / 10:51 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-China Lodging Group Ltd - Preliminary RevPAR For Leased And Owned Hotels For Q1 2018 RMB 208 Versus RMB 174 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - China Lodging Group Ltd: 
* CHINA LODGING GROUP LTD - PRELIMINARY REVPAR FOR LEASED AND OWNED HOTELS FOR Q1 2018 RMB 208 VERSUS RMB 174 
* CHINA LODGING GROUP - PRELIMINARY OCCUPANCY RATE FOR LEASED AND OWNED HOTELS FOR Q1 2018 85.6 PERCENT VERSUS 85.0 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
